long_description: The REI Stuff travel duffel offers a versatile storage solution: carry it like a duffle or wear it like a backpack, and when you're finished, simply stuff it in to its own pocket. Backpack straps hide in their own sleeve when not in use; nylon carry handles offer solid haul points. Nylon fabric is light and durable, and compacts easily for travel use. Includes anchor points for attachment of a single shoulder carry strap (not included). When not in use the REI Stuff travel duffel folds in to its own zippered pocket; simply turn the pocket inside out and start stuffing.
short_description: The REI Stuff travel duffel offers a versatile storage solution: carry it like a duffle or wear it like a backpack, and when you're finished, simply stuff it in to its own pocket.
